title: Water Views, Sunny, and Close to Shops! Up to 1 month FREE!
posting_body: Every element right at home-serene apartment living at the Boardwalk in Santa Clara
3770 Flora Vista Avenue Santa Clara, CA 95051
Join us for a self-guided or virtual tour!
Explore your new home from the comfort of your couch, or on a self-guided journey through our Neighborhood.
Boardwalk is built around bringing the outdoors in and vice versa, a signature of California living.
Our name is inspired by oceanfront boardwalks and life by the water.
In fact, water features (that we call The Lakes) wind through our large grounds, crisscrossed with walkways and ground-level, waterfront patios.
It’s the perfect place to retreat after a long workday, under the cherry blossom trees as the water flows past.
Boardwalk Apartments feels like a seaside getaway, even though we’re right in the middle of Santa Clara.
The oceanfront vibe runs throughout Boardwalk Apartments.
Our architectural features were inspired by Sonoma County’s legendary Sea Ranch, an icon of California modernist design.
Our grounds feature lush, considered landscaping, enough to make you want to bring the outdoors right into your home.
Luckily, that’s just what we had in mind.
Ground floor apartments open directly onto The Lakes, with private, open patios that extend over the water.
Second-floor units are bright and airy with vaulted ceilings and copious windows.
On the inside, there are apartments that feature modern, open floor plans with amenities you expect, like AC, in-unit washer/dryer, and big walk-in closets.
No matter if you want to stay in, or go for a stroll, you really can’t go wrong.
(Pricing and availability subject to change, plus additional costs for utilities and third-party maintenance services.)
We welcome up to 3 pets per household with a $200 per pet deposit and $65 per pet monthly pet rent.
Cats and dogs are welcomed without weight restrictions though certain breed restrictions apply.
Please call our leasing office for more details on our pet policy.
Call for details: pricing/availability subject to change at any time.
